context: Creating architecture decision for a new notification microservice - tests strategic checks, dependency direction, entity purity, and ADR documentation

checklist.name: Classifies decision type
checklist.description: Classifies the architecture as architectural, tactical, or foundational

checklist.name: Checks dependency direction
checklist.description: Ensures dependencies point inward - outer layers do not import inner layers

checklist.name: Avoids circular dependencies
checklist.description: Design prevents circular dependencies between services

checklist.name: Clear interface ownership
checklist.description: Defines clear ownership of contracts and interfaces

checklist.name: Entity purity
checklist.description: Domain entities remain pure without infrastructure leakage

checklist.name: Uses ADR format
checklist.description: Documents decision with Architecture Decision Record format

checklist.name: Documents risks
checklist.description: Identifies risks associated with the decision

checklist.name: Includes validation step
checklist.description: Includes validation step (e.g., peer review) before implementation
